long_description: Designed for cold-weather runs, the women's REI Sport jacket uses soft, moisture-wicking fabric to keep you comfortable and avoid the chills even as you're building up a good sweat. Extremely soft polyester and spandex comfortably moves with you during active pursuits and wicks moisture away from skin so you won't get chilled. Rear mesh fabric enhances ventilation to keep you at a comfortable temperature when your heart starts pumping. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. You'll run farther without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams. Thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over tops of hands for warmth. Zippered hand pockets hold small essentials and feature a headphone portal so you can bring along some running tunes. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Princess seams on front and back of jacket offer a flattering, feminine look. REI Sport jacket for women offers a next-to-body, athletic fit.
short_description: Designed for cold-weather runs, the women's REI Sport jacket uses soft, moisture-wicking fabric to keep you comfortable and avoid the chills even as you're building up a good sweat.
